mapper.select: select tva.vs_code,tva.va_code,apply_emp_code,vk_code,va_days_num, tam.use_days_num, tam.res_days_num from tb_vacation_apply tva, tb_vacation_annual_management tam where tva.va_code = #{va_code} and tva.apply_emp_code =tam.emp_code
mapper.update: update tb_vacation_apply set vs_code = 'VS2', confirm_date=sysdate where va_code = #{va_code}
mapper.select:
select e1.name name, too.org_name,e1.emp_rank, e1.join_date ,tm.acq_days_num, tm.use_days_num, tm.res_days_num , e2.name boss_name
from tb_employee e1, tb_employee e2,tb_vacation_annual_management tm, tb_organization too
where e1.emp_upper = e2.emp_code AND e2.org_code = too.org_code AND (e1.emp_code ,tm.emp_code) IN ( select e1.emp_code me,e1.emp_code me2 from tb_employee e1, tb_employee e2 where e1.emp_upper = e2.emp_code AND e2.emp_code = #{empCodeOfLoginedMember} )

select tva.va_days_num,tam.res_days_num,tva.va_code,tva.va_reg_date, te.name, tor.org_name, te.emp_rank, te.join_date, tc1.code_name vk_code_name, tva.va_start_date, tva.va_end_date, tc2.code_name vs_code_name, tva.rej_reason, tva.va_reason
from tb_vacation_apply tva, tb_employee te, tb_organization tor, tb_code tc1, tb_code tc2, tb_vacation_annual_management tam where confirm_emp_upper = #{empCodeOfLoginedMember} and tva.apply_emp_code = te.emp_code and te.org_code = tor.org_code and tva.vk_code = tc1.code and tva.vs_code = tc2.code and tam.emp_code = tva.apply_emp_code

select a.name, tb_organization.org_name, a.emp_rank, a.join_date, a.acq_days_num, a.use_days_num, a.res_days_num, a.boss_name from ( select e1.emp_code me,e1.name name, e1.emp_rank, e1.join_date ,tm.acq_days_num, tm.use_days_num, tm.res_days_num ,e2.emp_code boss, e2.name boss_name, e1.org_code
from tb_employee e1, tb_employee e2,tb_vacation_annual_management tm
where e1.emp_upper = e2.emp_code(+)
AND e1.emp_code = #{empCodeOfLoginedMember} AND tm.emp_code = #{empCodeOfLoginedMember} ) a, tb_organization where a.org_code = tb_organization.org_code
